website_summaries.verdict: If you want whole-food vitamins at a reasonable price, these are a sound option. Just be aware that they aren't organic.
pros: Has energy-boosting fruit and vegetable powder
Available for different ages, and quality assured by Good Manufacturer Practices (GMP)
cons: Some testers found that they are difficult to swallow and cause stomach upset

customer_reviews.title: From my research, the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired physician and take these vitamins personally. I recommended them for all my patients. They contain virtually everything a busy, non-compliant eating regimen requires :-) . I do suggest only 1 or 2 per day as 3 is "overkill" for most adults. I did extensive research prior to recommending these and have faith in both this product and the other products from Nature's Way. I received No compensation of any kind for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ralph

customer_reviews.title: My mood became better a day after taking this
customer_reviews.text: Hits a lot of possible deficiencies. Proper vitamin D, K, Iron, and zinc dosage. I once tried to take zinc supplement alone but made me vomit, and this doesn't do that. My mood became better a day after taking this. This tells me I had a kind of deficiencies as I don't eat that much fruits. An advice though, do NOT take 3 pills at a time since one will most likely urinate a LOT out. You will have neon-like yellow urine. Body can only absorb so much vitamins at a time. ....and another one, don't think of this as a replacement for fruits and greens. Whole foods are always better.
customer_reviews.author: mike choi

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! I've been using these for a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I've been using these for a few months and can definitely tell the way they affect my health for the better. My nails and hair have been growing a lot since taking these, and I can tell I have way more energy when I am consistent with taking them 3 times a day. They're a little large, I don't have a problem taking them though - they are very smooth so they don't get stuck. The taste is very mineral-like and can take some getting used to (I plugged my nose for a while)
customer_reviews.author: teach4life

customer_reviews.title: Defective inner seal - it was burnt
customer_reviews.text: The inner seal was burnt, pretty strange. They are sending a replacement free of charge, I will adjust my review down the road. The pill itself is large.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin For Great Nutrition With Probiotic Effect
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great vitamin. It will give you extra energy and this combo seems to promote more absorption of daily food intake and nutrients. Based on my experience, I recommend. A little pricier and the pills are big (however smooth and easy to swallow) but worth it if you have the extra money. If I'm not mistaken I think this has a probiotic effect as well more so than just your average multivitamin.
customer_reviews.author: 99 Cent Pub

customer_reviews.title: Great value vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I think these are the best value vitamins on the market. I'm a primary care physician assistant so I've spent a lot of time researching vitamin recommendations for patients, and these are what I buy for my husband and myself. For less than $20/month, these have great ratios of all your most important vitamins. Only downside is I can't take more than one at a time without getting nauseated (a serving size is 3.)
customer_reviews.author: SmolCat

customer_reviews.title: Pills are huge!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big man, 6' 3" and I had a difficult time swallowing these. It felt as if they stayed half way down my throat for several hours. I tried taking these 3 days in a row and just can't do it. I would rather the dose be 4 pills and make them 25% smaller. If you have a hard time with larger pills, these are not for you. They remind of the 500mg pills you get with certain antibiotics. And to take 3 of them was a chore for me. Anyone interested in buying a bottle with only 8 pills missing? :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Fern

customer_reviews.title: when the recommended dose is three a day
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of multivitamins, and I always come back to this one. It seems whenever I'm taking this supplement my quality of life rises and I only take 1-2 a day on average, when the recommended dose is three a day.. I love it! Apparently it's all natural, and it's got more than just great plant-based vitamins and minerals, there are plenty of other plant extracts, such as enzymes that are great as well. It covers just about everything, brain function, energy, mood, digestion, antioxidization and so on.. Check it out! This is my go-to multivitamin, I highly recommend it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Seth P.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid - there are MANY better alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: As a natural health expert that has tried many products on the market I generally know what works well. I felt worse not energized on this product not to mention that it caused disruption in my intestinal tract. I wouldn't even finish the bottle. No bueno.
customer_reviews.author: VIB

customer_reviews.title: Take with Food
customer_reviews.text: On an empty stomach this vitamin made me extremely nauseated and light headed. Plus the few few days were also hard even with food. I think this is because of the insane amount of B vitamins in here. I never take the full dosage at one time because it just makes me feel very off. I really just got this to supplement college dining and it gave me peace of mind whenever I didn't eat properly. I have never felt any symptoms of vitamin deficiencies with this product.
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: Huge pills but great benefits!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tablets. Tablets are huge but they give me the energy and enzymes needed for daily activities. Price is right and is very competitive among others here. Look at the DV of each vitamin/mineral though. I have not found many other brands that can match up to these DV % without taking 5 pills. So although the pills are huge, you do get a lot out of them for a good price. These are also made out of fruits and veggies. I just wished they had an organic version but for now they are my favorite brand!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why, but every time I took these vitamins, within 1/2 hour or so I would become groggy, disoriented and felt just generally unwell for hours at a time. I tested this a few times to make sure it wasn't something else, and it was definitely these supplements. I sent a pic of the back label to a Dr. and she was astonished at some of the high percentages of vitamins and minerals and just the sheer volume of stuff in there. Just for clarity- I am allergic to nothing and have no chronic health issues so beware before taking these for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Gay

customer_reviews.title: These are the best multivitamins I have ever taken
customer_reviews.text: These are the best multivitamins I have ever taken. Three weeks in and I noticed a boost in energy. My skin has improved and I started seeing less hair in my brush and more on my head. The thing that impressed me the most was how strong my nails became. I'm 56 years old and have never been able to grow them before. Love these vitamins and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a great product with a great price. Unfortunately, my husband is allergic to some of the ingredients. His reaction was a horrible cough that prevented the intake of air - scary. Because of the time it took to figure out the cause, I was unable to return them. If you are considering this product, know your allergies. It will help you.
customer_reviews.author: Steph3815

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: For months I was feeling lightheaded and fatigued about 30 minutes after taking these. Once I stopped the feeling went away. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ailec

customer_reviews.title: Hey,  my hair is growing back!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an overall multivitamin. This one got great reviews so I gave it a shot. I take one a day on most days (OK, I skip here and there); and after about a month I noticed I have all this hair growing at my hair line. Wow! What an added bonus; I feel energized and wonderful, AND my hair is growing back after a stressful time. This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie I Sedell

customer_reviews.title: The flash
customer_reviews.text: Does as told, but don’t be alarmed if it turns your piss highlighter yellow. That’s the riboflavin. It’s normal.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Jennings

customer_reviews.title: The energy boost you've been missing!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! The amount of energy you have when you're on this stuff is crazy. You will definitely notice a difference if you skip a day. The dosage is three/day but I would recommend spreading them over the course of a day and make sure you take them with food. No weird burps and it doesn't upset my stomach. However, your pee will be highlighter yellow. Drink plenty of water!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! It was delivered to me around 5pm and I was so excited and took a dose... needless to say I spent all night awake to the point where I just got out of bed and did house chores. Since then, I’ve taken it in the AM right after having breakfast. They are a little big so be careful and take one at the time and don’t try to swallow all 3 together. It’s a good investment for your health!
customer_reviews.author: 8ar813

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, potent vitamins. I’ve read some reviews complaining about the size, but I find it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Slaronoff

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste but work good
customer_reviews.text: Cons: They taste awful while you swallow them. They are huge and make me gag. Have to take 3 tablets. Pros: IF you take the 3 tables, they do give you energy. It makes me pee a LOT and I mean a LOT. It makes also my pee a neon yellow. Every time I take these vitamins. I sure hope is a pro ha.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kortyna

customer_reviews.title: Love this multi
customer_reviews.text: I spent most of this winter and spring fighting a cold that would not quit, trying to eat well and get my nutrients that way - but then I remembered a handy little thing called the multivitamin. I did a little research and Alive Max3 Daily seemed to provide the most legitimate bang for your buck, according to the vitamin blogs. I have since added this to my routine and I am convinced it has boosted my immune system and energy. I'd bought the women's multi from Alive! before and liked it just fine, but this one seems more potent, more packed into each tablet. Definitely needs to be taken with food or else nausea sets in almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Label inconsistency
customer_reviews.text: Really am a big fan of the nature way Alive vitamin. My previous bottle was listed as Alive Whole food energizer multi-vitamin. The bottle sent to me recently was listed on the label as Alive Max3 Daily multi-vitamin. Plus the vitamin is quite smaller than the previous bottle. The serving size 3 tablets on this bottle is 10 calories, previous bottle was 15 calories. All in all the previous bottle the vitamin's were larger and had more of something but don't know what. The UPC code on both bottle's previous and new one are the same #33674 14928. Will still take these but it is a little deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnman

customer_reviews.title: I'm over 60 and these vitamins improve my nutritional intake because I don't eat balanced meals
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and don't eat balanced meals like when I used cooked for when I had a houseful of kids. After comparing other brands I believe these are the best vitamins available. I take them regulary and can feel the positive difference they make in my energy and well being.
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian von Hammerstein

customer_reviews.title: Good combination of vitamins and minerals
customer_reviews.text: This product has a lot of the micronutrients that are hard to find and that I’ve been told can help with osteoporosis. I also like that there is no iron. I take my iron at a different time of day so that it doesn’t interfere with calcium absorption
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated Karen

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the highest potency and highest quality multivitamin that I could find. I've been taking these for years and they have never let me down. It definitely gives me a piece of mind knowing that the odds and ends in my diet or any wholes that may be in my diet are filled by taking this
customer_reviews.author: Andrew autry

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Used for 3 days and I'm impressed. My energy levels are higher without the stimulant feel, I get more done and feel better. I'll continue taking and update my review if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as potent
customer_reviews.text: I use to LOVE this vitamin. You felt energized. Not as strong and potent as when it was originally made. Only one pill was recommended now 3? Ugh no!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Womack

customer_reviews.title: Natural whole food make you feel good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I first love that I can order this product on Amazon because they're usually out everywhere I try to buy it I love that it's a big bottle and I love that they are whole food vitamins which I am very concerned about the natural way over regular vitamins which tend to be a little more synthetic derived
customer_reviews.author: Joe's Liquor Mart

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Multi-Vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I like these multi-vitamins a lot. I feel that they supply the proper amount of vitamins and minerals on a daily basis. Contrary to what some other reviewer have written, these vitamins are not that large. I had no problem taking 2 at a time with a glass of water. I don't think I would take the recommended three at a time though! I also did not think they had a bad taste going down.
customer_reviews.author: Pinhead

customer_reviews.title: No disgusting vitamin smell here!
customer_reviews.text: The BIGGEST issue I have with multivitamins is the overpowering disgusting smell. These just smell like bran cereal, which I don't mind AT ALL!!! They are quite large but I will likely just cut them in half and take them that way. I haven't started taking them yet so this review is based solely on the smell but I am really looking forward to it! Will report back after I finish my first cycle!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: I love these vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I've taken these for a while now. The directions say 3/day. I take 2/day- AM/ PM. Seems to be working for me. They are a bit larger than many other vitamins out there. But, really, not THAT big. The smell can be a little strong. I mean, they do have a smell, but it's not offensive or powerful. It's a vitamin smell. I don't find that they leave a taste, and I'm not tasting them later during the day ;-P. They do make your urine look like you ate a flourescent yellow marker, but that seems to be the only negative I have, and I'm reaching for that one!!
customer_reviews.author: UeeeeA

customer_reviews.title: They are just as good as any other I have used but less expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have taken these vitamins for quite some time and I can't complain. They are just as good as any other I have used but less expensive. Bonus, my Wife has a gluten allergy and these are gluten free. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stomach cramps!
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy.. these vitamins are giving me diarrhea and horrible stomach cramps. On the bright side I have lost 5 lbs in the last week. However, I will have discontinue taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: Pill size quite large
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 15 year old son because it was recommended by my holistic doctor. I gave 3 stars because my husband loves it but my son does not. Son states it has after taste and too large to comfortably swallow. I measured the pill, it is an inch long and quite thick.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vitamin. I have used off and on for a few years now. They are pretty big even for a three pill a day, but I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a difference
customer_reviews.text: I really felt a difference with these compared to the regular once a day vitamin. I definitely had more energy throughout the day. The pills are a bit large but manageable and the aftertaste isn't too bad. I recommend giving these a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My fiance takes this everyday, and says he can feel the physical difference between days that he takes them and those when he doesn't. The smell is a bit too strong for my taste, but he doesn't seem to mind it that much. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Incomparable value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've spent more than my share of time comparing multivitamin supplements. It's almost staggering how much Alive multivitamins surpass the competition, from its generous supplementation of some valuable nutrients that are good to have plentifully to the impressive variety of food-based blends, these are super-premium for the price. I can't imagine doing any better without spending significantly more.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: The best multivitmain out there
customer_reviews.text: Been taking this for years and love it. Gives me a nice energy boost. definitely notice that I am more energetic when I take this consistently.
customer_reviews.author: James Bush

customer_reviews.title: Alive multivitamins
customer_reviews.text: I like these vitamins as I started them 2 months ago & have found that I feel good & have more energy & I am getting my fruit & veggies at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zirkel

customer_reviews.title: Energizing indeed
customer_reviews.text: I love how these make me feel. I’m full of energy the whole day. These are great vitamins and have all the essential ingredients. They are a true pill to swallow but can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Tracybeth

customer_reviews.title: Get them
customer_reviews.text: My mom is a nutritionist for 30 years . This is the best vitamin you can take....period
customer_reviews.author: dennis r.

customer_reviews.title: 3 pills is a serving size
customer_reviews.text: A serving size is 3 pills....that makes it not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Foothills hero

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but I will for this product. After battling with severe anemia, I searched the Internet and read the reviews for a good multivitamin with iron. I stumbled across this product and liked the reviews. When they arrived, I opened the bottle and the smell was horrible and the pills were huge. The bottle recommends taking 3, so I started with the recommended dosage, but it gave me a pretty bad headache. However, I was not nauseous, so I decreased my dose to 2 per day. Problem solved! My anemia is under control and I feel great. A very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Shenna

customer_reviews.title: I feel more energetic and even my skin looks better..
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a couple of weeks.. I feel more energetic and even my skin looks better..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, well balanced
customer_reviews.text: Sure, you can spend a lot more and get even better multivitamins but for the cost these are great and well balanced... Sure, you have to take 3 tablets a day but honesty any multi where you only take one small pill a day isn't going to do much for you. Yes, I take other supplements too, but if you had to take only one supplement and din't want to spend too much, this is a great way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: Repeat buyer. It has all the vitamins I need and doesn't taste badly when I take it. Good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Bellingham Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: DOes the job
customer_reviews.text: My mind feels clear, I feel healthier does the job great! also check labdoor shows that its one of the best multivitamins
customer_reviews.author: Burnaye

customer_reviews.title: Alive!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite multivitamins. Great source and high quality
customer_reviews.author: TerFamily

customer_reviews.title: Best Daily Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I love that these vistamins and minerals are derived from plant based nutrients! I take one every day!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo Willey

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins with a lot more daily pct than others
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamins with so much more pct than the others .
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good daily vitamins
customer_reviews.text: They are larger, so some people may not be able to take all 3 at a time. They also have a very unique taste if you take them on an empty stomach
customer_reviews.author: SkyChris

customer_reviews.title: This is the most complete multi vitamin I could find.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of this product and will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: JoSta

customer_reviews.title: Good Value vs Performance
customer_reviews.text: I came to this over using TSN Vita-T and GNC Mega Mens. I originally stopped taking Mega Men because the HydroxyCut I was starting had caffeine in it as well, and I didn't need that much. It works just as well as the other vitamins, and is a bit cheaper. I also prefer these vs the gelatin capsules of the Vita-T, as they don't "stick" in my throat.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Flynn

customer_reviews.title: By far the best multi-vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the best vitamins and these are it!!! It says you need to drink 3 a day. I drink 2 a day. Let me warn you, your pee will be really yellow lol. Don’t freak out. It’s our body getting rid of the excess B vitamins. At least it’s like that for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rip Kay

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a second time because I liked it, but was surprised to find the inner ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item (again) a few weeks ago, and I just opened the package. I bought this for a second time because I liked it, but was surprised to find the inner top seal open after I broke the initial clear plastic seal on the lid. Made me too nervous to injest. As you can see from the photos below, the silver seal that covers the bottle was broken after I took the plastic seal off. I did not break that seal.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: I sometimes feel better when I take them
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins make me feel tired after I take them. They also make my urine a really odd color. On the plus side, I sometimes feel better when I take them. I would not recommend them or buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I have only been taking this for a few days and I already feel less tired with better exercise tolerance.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without these??
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS STUFF! I had been researching different vitamins after learning that many are coated in plastic-based sprays, and stumbled upon Alive! It's plant-based with no harmful coating, and gives me a legitimate energy boost in the afternoon when I take one at lunch. I'm a teacher, and so often get sick because of my little germ-babies, but haven't even gotten a cold since I started taking these regularly. The pills smell a little funky, but you only have to smell them for a second :)
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Fossum

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for 3 months now and I have seen a big difference in several parts of my body, including my hair and skin. I have more energy and an overall better mood. I’m very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Mecham

customer_reviews.title: Mega Boost!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of multivitamins and these vitamins are by far the best. I actually feel a difference in my overall health and performance when I'm working out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary I.

customer_reviews.title: Gag me!!
customer_reviews.text: The smell of these is totally nauseating!! I’ll be throwing the nearly full bottle away!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Webb

customer_reviews.title: I think I like these well enough
customer_reviews.text: I think I like these well enough... though I've noticed I feel just a tad jittery after taking them. Not sure what ingredient may be doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works
customer_reviews.text: Alone with a good diet and these pills, you'll feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Potent for sure
customer_reviews.text: Seem potent and absorbable, but they better be for the price. I can tell by the color of my urine that a lot of money is going through me and into the toilet. First time using these, not sure if they're worth it or not. Will update after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: High quality purity and value multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good multivitamin. I looked for lab analysis regarding quality and purity. It listed #3 in purity and #4 in value when compared with 66 other multivitamins
customer_reviews.author: Nan Nampa

customer_reviews.title: Not for men, it has Iron
customer_reviews.text: It has Iron, bad for men. Delivered so hot. I think it went bad during delivery. Tablets are too big. Smells bad. Effective 100%. Got another one with no Iron from whole food.
customer_reviews.author: Hamid

customer_reviews.title: This vitamin supplement works.
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin supplement l is effective. One feels better and more active with its use. The pills are oversized making them hard/uncomfortable to swallow. May be the company should make smaller pills suggesing to take two pills at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ravinder K.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I tried
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Though I wouldn't take 3 daily because it is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Halpert

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, here's why...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking these for a few days, and I'm not going to come up with WOW! These work good! Time is much too short for noticeable effects, but I will state this, looking at its nutrition label, it is unbelievable for how much nutrition is provided. Just knowing how much is crammed into these, even tho you do take 3 easy to swallow tablets, knowing there's fruits and vegetables and all their goodness besides vitamins, is amazing. Very happy I bought these, especially since I find it VERY hard to eat fruits - vegetables daily or even weekly. You'll be impressed! Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Best multivitamin i have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: These things do double duty as great all around multivitamins/minerals and energy boosters. I work night shift from 630pm until 7am. If it wasn't for these and something to do, I would not make it through my shift. My sister in law who sells vitamins said that these are one of the highest rated. Her brand is the best but they are a little more costly. I would recommend these to anyone if they asked.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey selco

customer_reviews.title: Everything but the kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for nearly 4 months now, I'm almost out and need to reorder. From day one upon switching from my one a day, I noticed a significant change in my mood and energy levels. I mostly just take one of these each morning, and occasionally another in the afternoons, and only all three before a 5k run or a stressful day. As a side note, I haven't been sick in any way since taking these wonder pills, mixed with my daily evening dose of 5mg melatonin I can happily recommend this product to everyone I meet.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reiss

customer_reviews.title: Energy up!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken these vitamins for years. Always come back to them, as I feel noticeably more energetic and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Hertzler

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, about $10-20 less than my local grocery stores!
customer_reviews.author: Redcloud 58

customer_reviews.title: Always very pleased with Alive vitamines, it's the only viteamine I trust
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Alive vitamins for at least ten years. I will never use anything else. To explain why, I used a different vitamine before and when I missed a few days I didn't miss them. When I started using Alive. I didn't use them for a few days and I knew immediately I had forgotten to take them. That proved to me that my body actually absorbs them and that they really do help. I love my Alive and it helps me heal faster and stay healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Utahn

customer_reviews.title: Take care of your body
customer_reviews.text: Best vitamins to stay healthy and strong during covid.no belching take daily
customer_reviews.author: kelly sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to absorb very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multivitamin that quickly absorbs into your body. Will make urine a bright yellow from the excess Riboflavin, but the extra energy and health are more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: Already commented that these were stale and the color had turned. No one contacted me regarding this.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshyne

customer_reviews.title: these work great.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well, and if you want your fingernails to grow faster, these work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal price/quality!
customer_reviews.text: There's been a major price drop in this product. It was a good deal AT $32 considering it's a 2 month supply, and arguably the most complete multi on the market(for the price range). I've been using this for years, and my energy levels went up considerably 3 months after I started using it. Read the EXHAUSTIVE ingredients label, you won't find anything close for $21!
customer_reviews.author: LuvAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Was a bit leary about some of the info in ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit leary about some of the info in the reviews, but the smell is not offputting. They are large but no larger than any other multi. Just wish I didn't have to take 3 to get full dosage. I chose these based on their A rating on LabDoor.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, but180 tablets, just one month!.. hope the price is going down!.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin that gives you energy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for a few years now. I feel better when taking regularly. I cut down from 3 to 2 a day after reading reviews which has not changed my satisfaction with these multivitamins.

customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins I get instant natural energy no jitters and the price is great.

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin!

customer_reviews.title: SO DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: The smell alone makes me gag!!! It smells like cat pee!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: They really work well!
customer_reviews.text: I actually notice a difference with these. Have a bit more energy and my nails and hair have never grown faster (forever cutting my nails within weeks of taking these). Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Concrete Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Pound for pound the beat potency daily vitamin in the retail mainstream that i have found.
customer_reviews.text: Way more potency per pill. Just compare it!!! Thsi aint no “one-a-day” junk. It has meaningful quantities of everything you want. And way cheaper than the wholistic type docs prescribe in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Carroll

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is the size of the pills
customer_reviews.text: They are provided daily my veggies and fruits!. The only thing I don't like is the size of the pills. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: The pill size is a bit big, so it ...
customer_reviews.text: The pill size is a bit big, so it was hard to swallow a little, but I eat well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Alive gummie vitamins for adults
customer_reviews.text: I got these vitamins for my teenage son who is 14. He doesn't eat great ( hardly any fruits or veggies ) so that's why I ordered these. They have 26 fruit & veggies in them. He also likes the taste of them, so they've been a good daily supplement for him. I don't have to harp on him to take them. We will keep purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these. They taste good and are more natural than some other vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Vitamen response
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad time with energy but this vitamen I feel will make me feel so much better, sooner
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pass me more co-pilot...
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone get the reference?? These are seriously like horse pills though. It takes some getting used to. They seem to be pretty good vitamins, i really don't have any way to prove that though. I guess when I don't take them i feel less alive, but that's pretty subjective.
customer_reviews.author: Bob LaBlaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The #1 best Multi Vitamin hands down.. Good luck finding better.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they are fresh when you receive them.
customer_reviews.text: Check the expiration date! I've ordered this vitamins many times and I've been taking this brand for several years now. I used to really like them. But I notice that the date on the last two orders have been within a few weeks of expiring. This seems to make a difference because I've been getting leg cramps at night when taking the vitamins. I never had that problem before and I think it has to do with the fact that they seem to be reaching the expiration date even though I hadn't had them long enough to finish the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: itsDawnOfficial

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these a good vitamins but I stopped taking them after the first day. They are so big and stinky and you're supposed to take them several times per day. I woke up the next morning after taking these and could smell the vitamins in my body. I couldn't deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them Best one i have ever had i keep ordering them If you try them you will love them !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

product_meta.title: Nature's Way Alive! Max3 Daily Adult Multivitamin, Food-Based Blends (1, 060mgper serving) & Antioxidants, 180 Tablets
product_meta.description: Size:180 Count (Pack of 1)"The most potent, nutrient-diverse Alive! multivitamin in a complete, 3x daily tablet 100%+ daily value of 20 of vitamins & minerals 200%+ daily value of 12 vitamins & minerals 300%+ daily value of 9 vitamins & minerals Orchard Fruits/Garden Veggies & Daily Greens Powder Blend (600 mg) Premium B-Vitamins: Featuring the active form of B12 (methylcobalamin) and folate (L-Methylfolate) With greens, mushroom mycelial, enzymes, bioflavonoids, choline, inositol, eleuthero, rutin, and lutein Cardio blend*"
feature_bullets: MULTIVITAMIN: Alive! multivitamin for adults contains a diversity of daily essentials, greens, phytonutrients and antioxidants Vitamins A, C, and E
Premium B-Vitamins: Featuring the active form of B12 (methylcobalamin) and folate (L-Methylfolate) to help convert food into energy

FOOD-BASED: Premium formula blends Orchard FruitsTM, Garden VeggiesTM, Daily GreensTM, and nutrients to support bone health, daily energy, eye health, heart health, and immune health (600 mg per serving)*
ANTIOXIDANTS: Daily vitamin contains antioxidants of Vitamin C, Vitamin E, beta carotene, and selenium. Gluten free

SERVING SIZE: Adults take 3 tablets daily, preferably with food; Includes one bottle with 180 alive vitamins *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
